name: arbiter
description: CUE-based specification validation and management CLI with agent-first automation and monorepo architecture

scripts.dev: FORCE_COLOR=1 concurrently --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" --names "typecheck,api" "bun run typecheck:watch" "NODE_ENV=development AUTH_REQUIRED=false bun run --cwd apps/api dev"
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "bun run typecheck:watch" "NODE_ENV=development AUTH_REQUIRED=false bun run --cwd apps/api dev" "bun run --cwd apps/client dev"
scripts.dev:full:auth: concurrently "bun run typecheck:watch" "NODE_ENV=development AUTH_REQUIRED=true bun run --cwd apps/api dev" "bun run --cwd apps/client dev"
scripts.build:all: bun run build:shared-types && bun run build:shared && bun run build:importer && bun run build:cue-runner && bun run build:api-types && bun run build:core && bun run build:cli && bun run build:api
scripts.clean:all: bun run --cwd packages/shared-types clean && bun run --cwd packages/shared clean && bun run --cwd packages/importer clean && bun run --cwd packages/cue-runner clean && bun run --cwd packages/api-types clean && bun run --cwd packages/arbiter-core clean && bun run --cwd packages/cli clean && bun run --cwd apps/api clean
scripts.test: bun test packages/ apps/api --recursive && bun run --cwd apps/client test
scripts.quality: bun run format:check && bun run lint && bun run typecheck
scripts.quality:fix: bun run format && bun run check && bun run typecheck
scripts.validate: bun run quality && bun run test
scripts.dev:full:oauth: concurrently "bun run typecheck:watch" "bun scripts/dev-oauth-server.ts" "NODE_ENV=development AUTH_REQUIRED=true ARBITER_CONFIG_PATH=apps/api/config.dev-oauth.json bun run --cwd apps/api dev" "VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:5050 ARBITER_URL=http://localhost:5050 bun run --cwd apps/client dev"

author: Nathan Rice
